name: Subway Pet Run

In this Dog Race just Slide, roll and jump over the obstacles in your way and enjoy this cute puppy simulation with rainbow adventure of top simulator 2018!

Crazy run dash and jump forward as fast as you can, dodge obstacles! Take a trip down a fun park slide to reach mega heights of the quality fun games!

There are sweet pet puppies to choose, the cutest and kiddy running dog fun games for free.
The Cute Puppy Runner 2018 is very easy to play. Just hit the start button and pet run game will start as the running puppy of crazy subway city run. You have also a facility to make Pause the running pet in an emergency of work and then resume your adorable pet game and enjoy 3d racing from there where you have just left this easy games for free.
Have an endless fun with the baby pet games, cute puppy endless running games for iPhone free.
